events.name: Building data analytics infrastructure for growing tech companies
events.description: Title: Building data analytics infrastructure for growing tech companies Description: For a fast-growth startup with increasing need for analytics, the talk will walk through the thinking, design and implementation of a general analytics infrastructure that is simple to understand and easy to scale as the demand grows. A few pointers about the technologies in the analytics space and how they play well together, tips on how to choose an analytics database, and a typical data process in a startup will be shared. About the Speaker Huy Nguyen is the CoFounder of Holistics, a data reporting platform for tech startups, aiming to be the “Google Analytics for your own database”. Holistics’ customers include well-known tech startups like Grab (GrabTaxi) and Tech In Asia. Previously Huy worked at Viki and helped build their data analytics infrastructure. --------------------------------------------------------------------- Special thanks to our host NUS Enterprise.

events.name: On-going: Functional Programming in Scala Coursera Study Group
events.description: Study group for the Coursera Functional Programming in Scala Specialization, and all of it's courses.  Anyone may attend regardless of your progress in the courses.  We're here to help. If you have not already, please make sure that you have signed up for the courses you are interested in, on Coursera. <a>Functional Programming in Scala5-course Specialization·École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne</a> It's a good idea to have your development environment set up, before attending.  You can find instructions within the courses themselves.
events.location: Lowercase, 1 McNally St, Blk D #01-01, Singapore

events.name: Maker Apprenticeship Programme Info Session 2
events.description:
The Maker Apprenticeship Program (MAP) is back for its third season!

MAP is an intensive 10-week maker bootcamp where apprentices will learn all the skills and toolsets to the trade and apply them in a project showcase at the end of the program. This new season will run from late August till November, and will feature three tracks for maker mentorship

:

Makerpreneurship - our unique brand of making for a living and entrepreneurship



Social Good - join forces with non-profits and social enterprises groups in Singapore and champion a cause!



(NEW) Creative Making - Be part of an artist collective and learn about new artistic mediums!



Come on down to the Prototyping Lab @ NDC on Aug 11, 730 - 9pm to find out more about our flagship Maker Apprenticeship Programme, and hear from our Maker Apprentice alumni and Maker Mentors on how the Maker Apprentice Programme has helped to open a new chapter in their lives!
events.location: OneMaker Group - OMG, 111 Middle Road, #01-02, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969
